Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3672 affecting package pgbouncer for versions less than 1.24.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-3672 affecting package pgbouncer for versions less than 1.24.1-1. This CVE either no longer is or was never applicable.
